    Description
    Logger
    This helper class implements static methods that log on the standard output a required message
    NetworkConfigurationData
    Class that retrieves information regarding the network-related configuration of the client ( socket of the server and rmi interface) by either reading an apposite file or by requesting the user to insert network data
